Webmoney is failed. Payment system declined the transaction. - page 14
#131
Abubakar Abu Saidu
#:Iv'e been using paypal for the past few years on MQL.. It was really difficult and cost me a lot withdrawing to Webmoney earlier!
Not untill after i connected my EMAIL to our Company's Paypal account!.
Direct Bank withdraw works but for only $1k-$3k. Once you have $1k.. contact service desk and they'll process it for you!.
did you checked BANK TRANSFER withdrawal for 1K from service desk?
#134
Someone please share their opinion on how to withdraw from mql5.com. I need advice please.
#135
Any Nigerian been able to find a way around this withdrawal issue? Kindly share your solution please.
I have tried using webmoney but failed.
PayPal not allowing Nigerians to receive money.
I tried First bank Master card but failed too.
